wishala samagamwala eekabaddhawim saha athpath karaganim adhikshanaya kirima, tharangakarithwa ki්rayawaliyata badhakari wannawu ganudenu thahanam kirima, kisiyam wisandum yojana kara sitima aadiya mehidi siduwe.
me aushadhaya mulinma nishpadanaya wi aththe 1989 wasare; ee adhika rudhira pidanaya, papuwe anjayina kakkuma aadi roga walata prathikarayak washayen.
mawa kohomatawath ayin karanna bari bawa therum gaththu mage ayiya , oogollange wedin eken sathiyak weddi thiranayak aran thibba.
aluth giwisume athi sanwidhanathmaka salasmata anuwa, kristhusge palli swayan palanayak atha.
abesekarayan thirapitapatha liyu gunadasa amarasekarayange karamakkarayoth ee wagemayi.
me nisa wada adhika usak athi rala pahara sambandhawa ha wada prabala sulan pilibandawa dakwana prathicharaya pilibandawa thawath adhyayana awashya wa thibe.
eseth nomathi nam rudhiraya pitawana pramanaya anuwa saniparakshaka thuwa nathinam pad maru kirimata athi apahasuthawa ha paudgalikathwaya wiya hakiya.
oyawa nodaka inna mata ba dulara.
